entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:47 p.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 4:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 3 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: NE 29 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snow mixed with ice pellets early in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
